summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting deeds to portions of the southwest one-quarter of Section 29, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M. and of a portion of the northwest one-quarter of Section 32, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; and of a portion of Lot 11, Block 5, Lindsley's Mineral Springs Plat; and of a portion of Tracts 2, 3, 6, and 7 of Meridian Avenue Acres, for street purposes and laying off Meridian Avenue North and North Northgate Way. (Meridian Avenue North - Unit B; Widen)
